meanings.definition: Jaguarondis: a wild cat native to Central and South America.
meanings.sent1: The jaguarondis roamed freely in the dense jungle.
meanings.sent2: We learned about jaguarondis in our science class.
meanings.sent3: The jaguarondis decided to take a nap in the sun.
meanings.sent4: Her eyes gleamed like those of a jaguarondis on the hunt.
meanings.sent5: The children were excited to see a real jaguarondis at the zoo.

meanings.definition: Jaguarondis: plural form of jaguarondi, referring to more than one of the wild cats.
meanings.sent1: A group of jaguarondis crossed the river together.
meanings.sent2: The researchers studied the behavior of jaguarondis in the wild.
meanings.sent3: The jaguarondis' footprints were everywhere in the mud.
meanings.sent4: The night was filled with the eerie calls of jaguarondis.
meanings.sent5: The jaguarondis' fur shimmered in the moonlight as they moved stealthily through the forest.
